title: In the land of bronze...
body:
I know bronze are jackers at strategy but this takes the cake. Kayle had 29 stacks on devourer but a 3-1 surrender by the rest of the team because "nidalee is so bad" and was copping verbal abuse. In champ select I'd already told our team that ALL AD IS DUMB. But ya most bronze just have no idea about strategy.

View this:

[Taking the cake for worst bronze strategy in history](http://oi60.tinypic.com/33uwe13.jpg)

replies.body: Honestly a full ad comp isn't really as bad as you think. Although it is really easy to counter full ad comp by stacking armor all you need to do when in a full ad comp is to buy a {{item:3071}}  and your whole team will benefit from the armor penetration debuff and with full ad comps it becomes really easy to destroy turrets and enemy structures.

> [{quoted}](name=SorakaXHealBoT,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=bjljsWB3,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-06T19:57:44.860+0000)
>
> Honestly a full ad comp isn't really as bad as you think. Although it is really easy to counter full ad comp by stacking armor all you need to do when in a full ad comp is to buy a {{item:3071}}  and your whole team will benefit from the armor penetration debuff and with full ad comps it becomes really easy to destroy turrets and enemy structures.

Its very bad. Don't do it. Not all champs can afford to have a black cleaver. But even if you do, the odds are that they have more armour anyways (their tanks). Plus once their mages have a seekers they can teamfight you already and then once they are ahead its gg.

You should't get caught up on other players poor decision making but it is good to realize them and use that knowledge to better yourself. Their team might have been able to come back but I would guess they admitted defeat in their minds and once that happens people start making poorer decisions and spiral down. 

All you can do about verbal abusers is mute them and keep in mind that they are frustrated that they cannot impact the game well enough so they have to seek out flaws in their team to justify their own failures.

To me it is good to bring these issues up so everyone can communicate their ideas on the matter but it would of been considerate to blank out the names. Not many people will remember their names but maybe a few will remember yours and think less of your opinion.

Firstly this post is for bronze to educate themselves, not for me. And it was the opposition team that were flaming Nidalee, so yeah she could just use the mute and continue the game. I mean they are winning the game, regardless of the score. And that's the whole point. Bronze need to learn strategy to understand power spikes, item builds, and learn not to surrender in winning positions and have more tenacity by thinking about the TEAM not just themselves.
